About Me

Let me tell you about myself and my experiences

Steven Merin

Greetings! I am currently studying Bachelor of Science in Infomation Technology at the University of Cebu.

I live in Cebu City, Philippines. I'm 22 years of age and a graduating student.

I am focusing my career on Web Development. I have decent experience in Front-end and Back-end development.
